item.description:
This is the same night as Project Runway (on TV), so there's a conflict. But I'm going to TIVO Project Runway and learn about Anna Wintour - the legendary Vogue editor-in-chief. She rules the world of fashion, of which I am a not-so-innocent bystander.

The September 2007 issue of Vogue magazine weighed nearly five pounds, and was the single largest issue of a magazine ever published. With unprecedented access, this film tells the story of legendary Vogue editor in chief Anna Wintour and her larger-than-life team of editors creating the issue and ruling the world of fashion.

I think we'll get a bite after somewhere in Harvard Square. The movie's at 7:30, so you'll get back home by 11:00.

So, put on your chicest togs and join me in September at the September Issue.
item.how_to_find_us: After I'll be in the front right of the theater. During the movie, I'll be sitting in the center.
item.name: September Issue - Anna Wintour + Vogue - What Could Be Better
